column1: 1. Who was the first French king who was baptized a Catholic Christian?
2. In what year was Clovis I crowned king?
3. What does the Catholic Church call France?
4. Who defeated the Muslims and stopped them from overtaking what would become France in 732?
5. Who became the first Holy Roman Emperor in 800?
6. What was the educational and philosophical movement Charlemagne promoted in Europe called?
7. After Charlemagne’s son died, what happened to his empire?
